p: Fig 7 presents the stationarity analysis results relating to HFRS incidence after using a first-order difference. The time series fluctuates around the value 0, indicating an overall uniform distribution. The ACF and PACF appear to be tailing off. It can be inferred from Fig 7. that, after taking the first-order difference into account, the time series shown in Fig 6. is a stationary time series. Therefore, for this paper we have chosen to use the first order difference to preprocess the data.
